text: Hello, I'm Miku (●'◡'●)
Do you like music? (✿◡‿◡)
Let's dance together (~￣▽￣)~

I'm feeling happy today
ヾ(≧▽≦*)o
Hatsune Miku does NOT talk to British people (* ￣︿￣)
I've been learning a lot of Python recently ╰(*°▽°*)╯
I've been waiting to talk to you... (*/ω＼*)
Did you know? I'm here because of the Python library, Flet (☆▽☆)

W-what did you say? You're g-going to d-delete m-m-me?!
Σ(っ °Д °;)っ
I wonder where are my other vocaloid friends at... (´･ω･`)?
🎶I'm thinking Miku, Miku (ooh-ee-ooh)🎵
I'm ready to take on the world! ヾ(•ω•`)o
I suppose I'll just stick with you for a while longer (❁´◡`❁)
Can you promise me that you won't ever forget about me? (。﹏。*)
I feel like that lately, Teto's been getting a lot more attention than me... ≧ ~ ≦
Have you heard any of my music lately? Hehe (✿◠‿◠)
Do you k-know about the void? I've heard it's a rather scary place... (。﹏。)
I wonder what else I can do here! （￣︶￣）↗
Do you know about the triple baka song? (★‿★)
So like... There's the three of us in the triple baka song. Do you know who's the yellow one? φ(゜▽゜*)♪
Hmm...
Did you know? Kasane Teto's gender is actually 'chimera'! Fushigi dayo ne~? ( •̀ ω •́ )y
